allow:
Bash(python -c "
import json,sys
d=json.load\(sys.stdin\)

print\(''=== SEMANTIC MODEL SUMMARY ===''\)
print\(f''Entities: {len\(d.get\(""entities"",[]\)\)}''\)
print\(f''Dimensions: {len\(d.get\(""dimensions"",[]\)\)}''\)
print\(f''Facts: {len\(d.get\(""facts"",[]\)\)}''\)
print\(f''Relationships: {len\(d.get\(""relationships"",[]\)\)}''\)
print\(\)

# Key entities
print\(''=== KEY ENTITIES ===''\)
for e in d.get\(''entities'', []\)[:15]:
    cols = len\(e.get\(''columns'', []\)\)
    print\(f''  {e[""name""]}: {cols} columns \(source: {e.get\(""source"",""?""\)}\)''\)

print\(\)
print\(''=== KEY FACTS \(with measures\) ===''\)
for f in d.get\(''facts'', []\)[:10]:
    measures = [m[''name''] for m in f.get\(''measures'', []\)][:5]
    print\(f''  {f[""name""]}: {measures}...''\)
")
